caption.p: Inferred HIV transmission clusters. HIV-1 transmission cluster diagrams illustrating the structure and demographics of the putative transmission clusters identified in the PRIMO ANRS CO6 cohort. A total of 387 of the 1356 (28.5%) individuals were connected with at least one other individual. Color indicates the reported transmission risk [ red MSM; green heterosexual (HTS), purple others]; and shape denotes gender ( ellipse male, square women). All edges represent a genetic distance of ≤1.5% separating nodes. All shapes are labeled according to the HIV-1 subtype. NA not available. White and unfilled dots correspond to missing informations
